document_data.caption2: Various depictions of the Young Strider wielding the great mallet of Silvanus
document_data.name: ''Great mallet of Silvanus''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''great mallet of Silvanus''''' was a magical mallet wielded by the Young Strider [[avatar]] form of the [[Faerûnian pantheon|Faerûnian]] [[power]] known as [[Silvanus]].
document_data.Powers:
This weapon originally had a ''+5 [[item enchantment|enchantment]]'', but in later years was reduced to being ''+2''. Its wielder could also cast ''[[call lightning]]'' once per minute, shoot out a fast-flowing stream of water out to {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} in a cone that was {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} in a diameter, or call upon Silvanus's unshakingly faithful [[wolf]]hound.

This wolfhound had a low level of intelligence, above that of the average wolf. It slowly regenerated over the course of a battle. And not even controlling [[magic]]s or [[psionics]] could break its loyalty to Silvanus.
